title: Vod
author: Vod
content: If you have myBB experience (specifically theming) and are willing to teach me a few things, I'd be willing to throw some crypto your way.   Post here with your experience if interested.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: MyBB is forum software. Shouldn't you look into Wordpress or Drupal for making a news site?

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Interesting, why MyBB for a news site, WordPress is highly recommended for news sites, they have an array of news magazine themes, and many of these are free I have never encountered a MyBB for a news site but it's possible, and it worth exploring, what is your goal in creating a news site in MyBB.I hope you can find an expert who can launch your MyBB news site, and looking forward to seeing that.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on November 21, 2023, 07:20:38 AMMyBB is forum software. Shouldn't you look into Wordpress or Drupal for making a news site?That software does not have what I need for a unique news site.

comments.author: disferret
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 21, 2023, 06:29:39 AMIf you have myBB experience (specifically theming) and are willing to teach me a few things, I'd be willing to throw some crypto your way.   Post here with your experience if interested.   What specifically are you looking to theme/functionality? Maybe I can help.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: disferret on November 23, 2023, 09:26:32 PMQuote from: Vod on November 21, 2023, 06:29:39 AMIf you have myBB experience (specifically theming) and are willing to teach me a few things, I'd be willing to throw some crypto your way.   Post here with your experience if interested.   What specifically are you looking to theme/functionality? Maybe I can help.  The site is in php, so I have no issues with functionality.   I have an excellent graphics designer, so I need someone who is familiar with mybb theming.  CSS especially - I always have issues with responsive CSS on mobile vs desktop.Vod

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 23, 2023, 11:08:58 PMThe site is in php, so I have no issues with functionality.   I have an excellent graphics designer, so I need someone who is familiar with mybb theming.  CSS especially - I always have issues with responsive CSS on mobile vs desktop.VodI know this for desktop, I was doing it for clan sites when I was like 12-14 years old. But not on myBB and mobile wasn't really a thing back then and even now I'm not the best at mobile optimization for standard sites.  But I could possibly help.

comments.author: Initscri
comments.body: Vod, good to see ya!It would have been a good 8 years ago but I used to work on plugins and themes for MyBB. I don't believe it should have changed much!It's been a while, if you don't recall I worked with you on the original BPIP ext.

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.created_time: November 28, 2023, 12:50:28 AMLast edit: December 09, 2023, 03:37:05 PM by arabspaceship123
comments.body: Web Development & Technical ServicesI don't have commercial myBB experience but I've used it years ago to test coding. It's a php forum so it shouldn't be a problem to tweak the CSS or any other part of code. I'll try to help if you send details for each mod.It's going to help if you send screenshots with max instructions explaining the problems you've experienced thanks. Quote from: Vod on November 21, 2023, 06:29:39 AMIf you have myBB experience (specifically theming) and are willing to teach me a few things, I'd be willing to throw some crypto your way.   Post here with your experience if interested.
